title: MsgModuleIOTabularOutputValueUpdated
description: A filtered version of a tabular output of a step from the current workflow.

viewId.description:
An ID associated with this filtered version of the tabular value.
This is needed to distinguish between different views of the same data value that may exist independently.

stepId.description: Unique ID of the step within the workflow that we are getting parameters for.

value.description: The actual value payload. TODO: The type will be set later
